summary:
A standalone retexture of the Falmer swords.
Also my first attempt at modding in Skyrim.
descriptionHtml:
A standalone retexture of the Falmer swords to resemble Demonic looking swords with Daedric stats and a 30 damage flame enchantment.

You can find two of the swords on a dark elf named Nex, and he\'s located in a small camp across the river at Riverwood. (Ignore the note he has on his body, it was an attempt at modding in something I haven\'t the knowledge to do yet.)

This is my first attempt at modding in Skyrim, and it shows considering its just a retexture of an existing sword and nothing that big, but if this mod goes well, I\'ll do more.

I hope you guys like it!
author: Danielallen12
